remarks.para: One may be inoperative closed for an associated inoperative pack.

numlitem.para: With one pack inoperative, limit altitude to FL350 or below.

note.para: With an air conditioning pack inoperative or OFF, isolation valve closed, and anti-ice OFF, a BLEED OFF Light may illuminate during takeoff power application. Under these conditions, the PRSOV is regulating air pressure to a point where the valve angle is small enough to activate the light switch. As engine power, and thus air pressure, is reduced the valve angle opens slightly and the BLEED OFF Light extinguishes.

numlitem.para: Limit flight altitude to FL350 or below.

placard.para: Placard respective Pack Control Selector "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Place affected Pack Control Selector on P5 panel to OFF.
Gain access to valve through ECS access door (193CL or 194ER).
Rotate manual override toward closed position until valve is locked closed.

caution.para: DO NOT USE EXCESSIVE FORCE ON MANUAL ACTUATOR NUT. IF RESISTANCE IS FELT ACTUATOR DAMAGE MAY RESULT.

sheet.title: FLOW CONTROL AND SHUTOFF VALVE INSTALLATION
